title: Confessing your love online is better than in person.
titleJP: 告白は直接よりオンライン（LINEやSNS）の方が良い

text.medium: Confessing your feelings online significantly reduces anxiety and stress.
text.hard: Utilizing digital mediums for romantic declarations effectively mitigates severe psychological anxiety.

deck.textJP: オンラインでの告白は緊張やストレスを減らします。

text.easy: Because you don't have to stand face-to-face.
text.medium: It is because you do not have to endure the immense pressure of standing face-to-face.
text.hard: This is primarily because the physical separation buffers the emotional intensity of direct interpersonal confrontation.

deck.textJP: なぜなら、対面で立つというプレッシャーに耐えなくて済むからです。

text.easy: For example, your heart won't beat too fast, and you won't panic.
text.medium: For example, you won't blush, shake, or panic like you might when talking in person.
text.hard: For instance, digital communication prevents the visible manifestation of involuntary physiological panic responses, such as excessive perspiration.

deck.textJP: 例えば、対面のように顔が赤くなったり、パニックになったりすることがありません。

text.easy: Therefore, online is a safer way to confess.
text.medium: Therefore, online confession is a much calmer and safer way to express your love.
text.hard: Consequently, remote digital declarations provide a psychologically secure environment for expressing vulnerability.

deck.textJP: よって、オンラインでの告白ははるかに落ち着いて気持ちを伝えられる方法です。

text.easy: You can choose your words carefully.
text.medium: Online confession allows you to carefully choose and edit your words.
text.hard: Asynchronous communication facilitates the meticulous curation of your romantic narrative.

deck.textJP: 言葉を慎重に選んで伝えることができます。

text.easy: Because you have plenty of time to type.
text.medium: It is because you have plenty of time to think, type, and rewrite before sending the message.
text.hard: This occurs because text-based interfaces grant infinite temporal leeway for drafting and redrafting prose.

deck.textJP: なぜなら、メッセージを送る前に考えて書き直す時間がたっぷりあるからです。

text.easy: For example, you can rewrite your message until it is perfect.
text.medium: For example, you can write a beautiful and polite letter without stumbling over your words.
text.hard: For instance, an individual can strategically refine their linguistic phrasing to maximize emotional resonance without the risk of verbal stumbles.

deck.textJP: 例えば、言葉に詰まることなく、美しく丁寧な文章を書いて送ることができます。

text.easy: Therefore, online helps you express yourself well.
text.medium: Therefore, confessing via text helps you convey your exact feelings perfectly.
text.hard: Thus, the capacity for extensive editorial revision renders digital confessions intellectually superior.

deck.textJP: よって、テキストでの告白は自分の正確な気持ちを完璧に伝えるのに役立ちます。

text.easy: Confessing in person shows true sincerity.
text.medium: Confessing directly in person shows your true sincerity and courage.
text.hard: In-person declarations inherently convey a profound level of emotional authenticity and personal valor.

deck.textJP: 直接告白することは、本当の誠実さと勇気を示します。

text.easy: Because they can hear your real voice.
text.medium: It is because the person can see your facial expressions and hear the earnest tone of your voice.
text.hard: This is because non-verbal cues, such as micro-expressions and vocal inflection, are critical vectors for transmitting genuine empathy.

deck.textJP: なぜなら、相手はあなたの表情を見たり、真剣な声のトーンを聞いたりできるからです。

text.easy: For example, looking into someone's eyes is very romantic.
text.medium: For example, looking directly into someone's eyes shows them that you are truly serious.
text.hard: For instance, sustained eye contact is a universally recognized psychological indicator of unwavering commitment and honesty.

deck.textJP: 例えば、相手の目を直接見ることは、あなたが本当に真剣であることを示します。

text.easy: Therefore, in-person confessions are more real.
text.medium: Therefore, face-to-face confessions feel much more genuine and impactful.
text.hard: In conclusion, the irreplaceable authenticity of physical presence makes in-person confessions overwhelmingly superior.

deck.textJP: よって、対面での告白の方がはるかに本物らしく、心に響きます。

text.easy: You can get a clear answer immediately.
text.medium: You can get an immediate and clear response without any painful waiting.
text.hard: Synchronous, face-to-face dialogue guarantees immediate declarative feedback, eliminating protracted ambiguity.

deck.textJP: 辛い待ち時間なしに、明確な返事をすぐに得ることができます。

text.easy: Because texts can be easily ignored.
text.medium: It is because online messages can be ignored or left 'on read' for several days.
text.hard: This is primarily because digital communication platforms easily enable ghosting and ambiguous read-receipt manipulation.

deck.textJP: なぜなら、オンラインのメッセージは無視されたり、何日も「既読無視」されたりする可能性があるからです。

text.easy: For example, waiting for a reply text makes you very sad.
text.medium: For example, waiting hours for a reply text creates terrible anxiety and misunderstandings.
text.hard: For instance, the prolonged latency between sending a digital declaration and receiving a response actively induces severe psychological distress.

deck.textJP: 例えば、返信のテキストを何時間も待つことは、ひどい不安や誤解を生み出します。

text.medium: Therefore, face-to-face prevents painful waiting and digital misunderstandings.
text.hard: Consequently, direct conversational engagement is crucial to avoid the psychological torture of digital latency.

deck.textJP: よって、対面での告白は、辛い待ち時間やデジタルのすれ違いを防ぎます。

text.easy: Isn't it too easy to fake your feelings online?
text.medium: Isn't it far too easy to lie and fake your true feelings when you confess online?
text.hard: Does not the digital veil of text-based communication inherently facilitate emotional deception and insincerity?

question.textJP: オンラインだと気持ちを偽るのが簡単すぎませんか？

text.easy: People can still write very honest messages.
text.medium: Even online, people can write deeply honest and heartfelt messages.
text.hard: Despite the lack of physical presence, carefully composed textual narratives can effectively convey profound emotional authenticity.

options.textJP: オンラインでも、人々はとても正直で心のこもったメッセージを書くことができます。

text.medium: Yes, because every single person on the internet is actually a robot.
text.hard: Indeed, human sentience has been entirely replaced by automated conversational algorithms.

text.medium: It doesn't matter because human love is made of cheap plastic anyway.
text.hard: Emotional attachment is fundamentally a synthetic construct devoid of intrinsic value.

text.medium: We should stop using phones and start sending carrier pigeons instead.
text.hard: The deployment of avian messengers remains the only cryptographically secure method of communication.

text.medium: I cannot answer this because I am literally a walking smartphone.
text.hard: My identification as an anthropomorphic mobile device precludes me from addressing emotional queries.

text.medium: We must be careful because emojis are evil spies sent by the government.
text.hard: Pictographic icons are actually covert surveillance tools utilized by intelligence agencies.

text.medium: The only honest way to confess is by using mental telepathy.
text.hard: Psychic cognitive transmission is the sole barrier against romantic deception.

text.easy: But staring at a screen is not romantic!
text.medium: However, just staring at a digital screen is not romantic at all!
text.hard: Nevertheless, the sterile interface of a digital screen completely obliterates the requisite romantic ambiance!

attack.textJP: でも画面を見つめるのは全くロマンチックではありません！

text.easy: You can add photos and music to make it special.
text.medium: You can easily make it romantic by adding special photos, digital letters, or meaningful music.
text.hard: The integration of multimedia elements, such as curated audio and personalized imagery, successfully artificially synthesizes a profoundly romantic atmosphere.

options.textJP: 特別な写真やデジタルレター、音楽を添えることで、簡単にロマンチックにすることができます。

text.medium: It is romantic because my smartphone screen is made of delicious chocolate.
text.hard: The integration of edible cocoa interfaces elevates digital communication to an unprecedented culinary romance.

text.medium: Romance was officially banned by the government last year.
text.hard: The socio-political prohibition of romantic engagement nullifies this aesthetic concern entirely.

text.medium: Instead of a human, you should just try going on a date with your laptop.

text.medium: Wi-Fi signals are actually the most romantic thing in the universe.
text.hard: The propagation of wireless radio frequencies represents the ultimate manifestation of universal affection.

text.easy: Staring at the sun is better.
text.medium: If you want romance, you should just stare directly into the hot sun.
text.hard: Unprotected ocular exposure to solar radiation is the definitive method of achieving romantic enlightenment.

text.medium: I don't need a partner because I am going to legally marry my internet router.
text.hard: My matrimonial commitment to networking hardware renders human courtship obsolete.

text.easy: Online is a calm and thoughtful way to confess.
text.medium: In conclusion, online confession is a thoughtful, low-stress way to show your true love.
text.hard: To summarize, the digital declaration of affection provides a highly curated, psychologically secure framework for establishing romantic connections.

options.textJP: オンラインでの告白は、思いやりがありストレスの少ない愛情表現の方法です。

text.hard: Ultimately, the transhumanist integration with mobile devices is the only viable path for romantic fulfillment.
